title: Kelly Gale on why she split with long-term boyfriend Johannes Jarl
text:
Kelly Gale has been dating actor Joel Kinnaman, 39, since April.

And in an Instagram Story Q and A session on Monday, the 24-year-old revealed why her prior romance with long-time boyfriend Johannes Jarl came to an end.

The Victoria's Secret model also told fans whether she's had breast implant surgery.

Model talk! Kelly Gale, 24, got candid on breast implant surgery and why she split with long-term boyfriend Johannes Jarl, in an Instagram Q and A session on Monday

'We grew apart but we're still good friends,' Kelly said of herself and high-school sweetheart Johannes.

'No [I haven't had breast implant surgery],' the brunette also revealed. 'The answer right now is no. In the future, that answer's going to change I'm pretty sure.'

In April this year, Kelly debuted her new romance with Joel at the Coachella Valley Music Festival in Indio, California, where they were spotted walking together and holding hands in the crowd.

Amicable: 'We grew apart but we're still good friends,' Kelly said of herself and high-school sweetheart Johannes

Rumours: The couple, who were living together in New York, sparked split rumours in November, when Johannes was a no-show at the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show in New York

Kelly and her ex Johannes were last spotted together in January as they attended the Australian Open, but it's unclear exactly when they officially parted ways.

The couple, who were living together in New York, sparked breakup rumours in November last year, when Johannes was a no-show at the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show in New York.

Meanwhile, Suicide Squad star Joel and his ex-wife Cleo Wattenström reportedly split in late 2018 after two years of marriage.

'They were actually close friends before they even started dating,' an insider told US magazine in January.

On surgery: 'No [I haven't had breast implant surgery],' the brunette also revealed. 'The answer right now is no. In the future, that answer's going to change I'm pretty sure'

New flame: Kelly Gale has been dating actor Joel Kinnaman, 39, since April. The couple are pictured this month

'So they've been able to stay really good friends even through the breakup. It's just made things much easier for both of them,' the source added.

Kelly and Joel have more than their stunning good looks in common - they were both born in Sweden, with the model growing up in Gothenburg while her beau was raised in Stockholm.

Kelly has graced the covers of multiple fashion magazines in addition to earning the title of Playboy Playmate of the month in September 2016.

Meanwhile Joel, whose real name is Charles, is best known for playing the lead role in the Swedish film Easy Money and the Netflix science fiction series Altered Carbon.
description: Kelly Gale has been dating actor Joel Kinnaman, 39, since April.
authors: Kristy Johnson For Daily Mail Australia
